warezcdn.name: Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!
warezcdn.title: Kono bijutsubu ni wa mondai ga aru!

imdb.title: Kono bijutsubu ni wa mondai ga aru!
imdb.plot: Focuses on an art club in a certain middle school, and its members: Subaru Uchimaki, who is a genius at drawing faces, but only wants to draw the perfect 2D wife; Colette, a rich troublemaker who never stops making mischief; and t...

episodes.title: These People Have Problems/Goodbye, Uchimaki-kun
episodes.plot: Uzumaki Subaru joins the Art Club with Usami Mizuki. Mizuki has a crush on Subaru, but he's only interested in 2D girls.

episodes.title: Case of the Lost Child's Love Letter Murder/Good Child, Bad Child, Lost Child/Love Letter Panic
episodes.plot: The President is dead, but not from bleeding to death, as it first appears. He's dead because the puddle of "blood" he's in is actually red paint that he'd gotten on Mizuki's painting.

episodes.title: Looking for a Lost Thing?/Short Bob/Indirect Kiss
episodes.plot: Colette can't find her rocket-err, locket. Subaru's new waifu could end up being a bald guy named Bob. Mizuki's friends can't stop teasing her about Subaru, so they follow her to the art club room.

episodes.title: Welcome to the Art Club/Colle Walk/Little by Little, Step by Step
episodes.plot: Tachibana is the new, fearful advisory teacher for the Art Club. Colette goes for a walk, putting herself at risk of being melted by the day star. Subaru offers to bring Mizuki's print-outs to her.

episodes.title: Misunderstanding Train/Dove and Mermaid and Pool Cleaning
episodes.plot: Colette gives a plaster head a tan, setting in motion a chain of unlikely misunderstandings. Colette becomes a bird.

episodes.title: The Curious Cute Transfer Girl/Worrisome Couple
episodes.plot: Subaru has a new classmate. Even though she's super pretty, Mizuki isn't too concerned, because he isn't interested in 3D girls. But this one girl knows what to say to get his attention.

episodes.title: Our First Joint Task?/Master Imari
episodes.plot: Uchimaki and Usami enter the art competition, encouraged by Yumeko and a new rival. Colette plans for her future, but Usami doesn't take her seriously.

episodes.title: Secret Room/Let's Treasure Hunt!
episodes.plot: Subaru and Mizuki get themselves locked inside a storage room. Help was on its way, but it was Yumeko. Subaru and Maria discover directions to a treasure left by previous members of the Art Club.

episodes.title: Chase After the Grimoire/Challenger Once Again/Moe Walk
episodes.plot: Subaru and the president are on a mission to preserve their dangerous book. Subaru's challenger returns for a rematch. The president takes Moeka on a tour around school.

episodes.title: Nostalgic Tako Is Blue/Usami Cram School/Buster Kaori
episodes.plot: Takeda pressures Mizuki into joining the student council. She doesn't have the heart to say no. Subaru and Colette are flunking, so Mizuki opens a study club at her place.

episodes.title: Unity! Empty Cans! Cultural Festival!
episodes.plot: The school festival is coming up. Subaru would rather not do contribute anything, but Himeko has some big plans.
